data.title: Three Dividend Stocks Ideal for Retirees: Realty Income, Retail Opportunity Investments & Apple
data.text: These three stocks could be a great place to put your nest egg to work.

data.title: Former Apple Retail Chief Ahrendts Defends Store Changes
data.text: Angela Ahrendts, former Apple Inc. head of retail, discusses her revamp of the company's stores and disputes the criticisms of the changes. She speaks with Bloomberg's Taylor Riggs on "Bloomberg Technology."

data.title: Samsung Vs. Apple: Comparing Business Models
data.text: Read an in-depth review of competing business models in the tech industry, including how Apple and Samsung are redefining corporate warfare.

data.title: FANG stocks in correction as trade tensions hit tech
data.text: FANG stocks are in correction as trade tensions hit tech.

data.title: The Final Trade: Apple, Alphabet, Dow & XHB
data.text: The Fast Money traders give the stocks they'll be watching next week, including Apple, Alphabet, Dow, and the XHB.

data.title: Dan Niles: "I'm still Short Apple"
data.text: Dan Niles of AlphaOne Capital Partners joins CNBC's "Closing Bell" for an exclusive interview.

data.title: Apple bought a start-up that was working on monitoring asthma in children
data.text: Apple bought Tueo Health, which was developing tech to help parents monitor asthma symptoms in children, using a mobile app and commercial breathing sensors.

data.title: Rising Chinese Nationalism Weighs On Apple Stock Amid U.S. Trade War
data.text: Chinese consumers sympathetic to the plight of their country's Huawei Technologies are turning on U.S.-based Apple, according to media reports.

data.title: Friday Apple Rumors: Touch ID May Return in 2020 iPhone
data.text: Friday's Apple Rumors include the release of iOS 12.3.1 to fix some bugs, a teardown of the new 2019 MacBook Pro and more.

data.title: FAANG leads Tech Rebound
data.text: Steve Milunovich, Wolfe Research managing director, and Brent Thill, equity analyst at Jefferies, join CNBC's "Squawk Alley" team to discuss FAANG stocks and their performance in the market.

data.title: MacBook Pro teardown reveals subtle changes to keyboard mechanism
data.text: The shift to a new butterfly keyboard mechanism is Apple’s least popular design decision in recent memory.

data.title: 'Few design changes' for 2019 iPhone ahead of 2020 5G iPhone release, Barclays says
data.text: Apple's 2020 iPhones will offer larger changes, including 5G, than this year's new iPhones, Barclays semiconductor analysts said.

data.title: Apple Analyst Says Wall Street Is Overly Negative On Trade War's Impact
data.text: The likelihood is low that Apple Inc. and its iPhones will feel the brunt of the tariffs given its strategic importance in the U.S.

data.title: Apple faces 'low likelihood' that its iPhones will be subject to tariffs, says Wedbush
data.text: Wedbush analyst Daniel Ives wrote Friday that Apple Inc.'s selloff due to escalating trade tensions with China looks overdone.
